body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Getting Around               Getting Around      Pipe Spring National Monument is a "walk-in" park. Visitors first enter the Pipe Spring National Monument-Kaibab Band of Paiute Indians Visitor Center and Museum. The historic buildings, garden, orchard and trailhead are located 150 yards beyond the Visitor Center and Museum.       An NPS graphic
